name: nanopore-microservices
description: Microservices architecture for nanopore sequencing workflow

scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:infrastructure
scripts.install:services: for dir in services/*; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ../..; done
scripts.install:infrastructure: for dir in infrastructure/*; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ../..; done
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:workflow-orchestrator" "npm run dev:sample-qc" "npm run dev:library-prep" "npm run dev:library-qc" "npm run dev:sequencing-setup" "npm run dev:sequencing-run" "npm run dev:basecalling" "npm run dev:quality-assessment" "npm run dev:data-delivery"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:infrastructure
scripts.build:services: for dir in services/*; do cd "$dir" && npm run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.build:infrastructure: for dir in infrastructure/*; do cd "$dir" && npm run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:infrastructure
scripts.test:services: for dir in services/*; do cd "$dir" && npm test && cd ../..; done
scripts.test:infrastructure: for dir in infrastructure/*; do cd "$dir" && npm test && cd ../..; done

author: Nanopore Tracking Team
